short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pickify is a service that searches images captured in the browser and recommends related products.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pickify - Smarter Shopping, Simplified
Traditional image search methods require users to switch to Google Lens via Google Home, which can be inconvenient. Additionally, finding desired products, exploring related items, and completing purchases often take significant time and effort.
Pickify streamlines this process, enabling consumers to discover and purchase products more intuitively and efficiently.

ðŸ“˜Key Features
- Similar Product Recommendations
Upload a product image, and Pickify will instantly recommend similar items. Simply click on a suggested product to be redirected to its page.
- Custom Combination Recommendations
Analyze your captured product images and get tailored recommendations for complementary products.

ðŸ“™How Pickify Works
Capture and upload an image of the product youâ€™re interested in.
Pickify analyzes the image and extracts relevant keywords.
Based on the keywords, Pickify identifies similar products and perfect combinations.
Click on the recommendations to continue your shopping seamlessly.

ðŸ“—Why Pickify?
Real-Time Suggestions: Save time with fast and accurate product recommendations.
User-Friendly Design: A simple, intuitive interface makes Pickify accessible to everyone.
Make your shopping experience more efficient and enjoyable with Pickify. Add the extension today and discover a smarter way to shop!
